summary: Adds 2 alternative renaissance lutes to wear while exploring Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[size=+4Option]Wearable Renaissance Lutes[/size]
[size=+2Option]By TheLozza[/size]
[line]

[size=+2Option]Update 2 - Fixed Glare with ENB's[/size]

Adds 2 renaissance lutes to all the forges around Skyrim. (Misc section)
I preferred the realistic looking 1700's Lute rather than the space age looking one in Skyrim, so I made a wearable version of it.
This was for personal use and I decided to release it :)

[list][*]Frontal Version[*]Back Version[/list]

Choose the best suited to your armor/player setup! :)

Requires [b]Dawnguard DLC.[/b]

[b]Special thanks to mlocascio for the models and textures from his mod and Dragonis0 for the ESP idea![/b]
[line]
[size=+2Option]Recommended Mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34110/?]Realistic Playable Lute by mlocascio[/url]
[line]
Have fun!
author: TheLozza

files.name: No Glare Fix - Better normal mapping
